description:
In the middle of their Center exam, Dr. Eggman suddenly takes over the system and locks them inside the world of Border Break.  Their Blast Runners are stolen and they`re shrunk to miniature size.  But Sonic arrives at the speed of light to save them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eggman vs. Sonic with Sega Hard Girls
Eggman vs. Sonic with the Sega Hard Girls
エッグマンvsソニックwithセガ・ハード・ガールズ
